title: India plans to set up pharma plants in Sri Lanka

title: Locals in Sri Lanka Accidentally Unearthed a Star Sapphire Worth $140 Million
snippet: Some of the most interesting discoveries people make seem to happen by accident. This theory came holds true for locals in Sri Lanka who recently made an epic discovery, and it happened entirely by change.

title: Locals in Sri Lanka Accidentally Unearthed a Star Sapphire Worth $140 Million
snippet: This theory came holds true for locals in Sri Lanka who recently made an epic discovery, and it happened entirely by change. According to Good News Network, a couple of residents in the area were digging a well and they then uncovered a boulder featuring two-and-a-half million carats of star sapphires.

title: Taliban urges US to stop evacuating skilled Afghans: Live
snippet: The Taliban on Tuesday urged skilled Afghans not to flee the country, as the new rulers of Afghanistan warned the United States and its NATO allies they would not accept an extension to a looming evacuation deadline - even as Western countries said time was running out.
